description: This file contains unit tests for the UserService class, testing methods such as readUser and readUsers, using Mockito to mock dependencies.

classes.name: UserServiceTest
classes.description: Test suite for the UserService class, testing user retrieval methods.

methods.name: setUp
methods.description: Initializes mock UserRepository and UserService instances before each test.

methods.name: readUser_found
methods.description: Tests successful retrieval of a user by identification number.

methods.name: readUser_notFound
methods.description: Tests that reading a non-existent user throws EntityNotFoundException.

methods.name: readUsers_success
methods.description: Tests retrieval of a paginated list of users.
